sources.title: A Bum Steer (1957)
sources.description: In this Cinemascope Terrytoon, Beefy the Bull retires from the bullfighting ring after successfully defending his championship. His son, Beefy Junior, vows that he too will become a great champion like his father, but his Mama insists on him taking music lessons instead. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-bum-steer-1957/

metadata.Plot: In this Cinemascope Terrytoon, Beefy the Bull retires from the bullfighting ring after successfully defending his championship. His son, Beefy Junior, vows that he too will become a great champion like his father, but his Mama insists on him taking music lessons instead.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Larz Bourne, Bob Kuwahara
